3mmm | Note that the term corresponding to the inexact set in eleven is negative due to the descent properties of P subscript k superscript script I discussed earlier. On the other hand, the active set term in eleven is negative due to the descent properties of the gradient mapping. This is crucial for our analysis as it allows us to consider the decrease in the inactive and active sets independently of each other. The two terms are unified since
